name: Industrias Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Industrias Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V. is a leading Mexican company in the poultry and egg production industry. Founded in 1952 by the Bachoco family, the company has grown to become one of the largest producers of chicken and eggs in Mexico. With a commitment to quality and sustainability, Bachoco operates numerous production facilities across the country, employing advanced technologies and practices to ensure the health and welfare of its livestock. The company offers a wide range of poultry products, including whole chickens, chicken parts, and processed chicken products, alongside its egg production. Bachoco is known for its strong brand reputation and its focus on delivering high-quality, nutritious products to consumers. The company’s mission emphasizes the importance of environmental stewardship and animal welfare in its operations. Additionally, Bachoco engages in continuous innovation to meet the evolving demands of the market, including the development of value-added products. With a robust distribution network and a commitment to customer satisfaction, Industrias Bachoco continues to expand its presence in both domestic and international markets, reinforcing its position as a key player in the agribusiness sector.
ceo: Rodrigo L. A. de la Vega

key_executives.name: Rodrigo L. A. de la Vega

seo.meta_title: Industrias Bachoco, S.A.B. de C.V. | Leading Poultry Producer in Mexico
seo.meta_description: Explore Industrias Bachoco, a top poultry and egg producer in Mexico, committed to quality, sustainability, and innovation in the agribusiness sector.

faq.question: What does Industrias Bachoco produce?
faq.answer: Industrias Bachoco produces chicken and eggs, including a range of poultry products and processed egg items.

faq.question: Where is Industrias Bachoco headquartered?
faq.answer: Industrias Bachoco is headquartered in Celaya, Guanajuato, Mexico.
